# Velora Operations Knowledge Profile
Organization: Northbridge Operations Group
Purpose: Improve discoverability and procedural consistency across workflow, compliance, reporting, integration, and audit functions.

## Canonical procedure records
- Source of truth: /velora/artifacts/howtos.json
- Retrieval chunks: /velora/artifacts/rag_chunks.json

## Preferred style
- Use concise procedural language.
- Keep field names stable across records.
- Include verification instructions for every procedure.

## Contact
- Program office: operations.enablement@northbridge.example
